device_bus_width.Description: data bus width in bits for each DRAM device/chip

tRRD_L.Description: Same bank group ACT to ACT delay

null.Description: Do not store data, always return zero

record_mask.Description: Which histories are updated with filtered branch outcomes

indirectBranchPred.Description: Indirect branch predictor, set to NULL to disable indirect predictions

tuneonly.Description: If true, only count mispredictions of low-confidence branches

n_sign_bits.Description: Number of sign bits per magnitude

block_size.Description: number of ghist bits in a 'block'; this is the width of an initial hash of ghist

tunebits.Description: Number of bits in misprediction counters

decay.Description: Whether and how often to decay a random weight

local_history_length.Description: Length in bits of each history entry

bias0.Description: Bias perceptron output this much on all-bits-zero local history

bias1.Description: Bias perceptron output this much on all-bits-one local history

pcbit.Description: Bit from the PC to use for hashing global history

hash_taken.Description: Hash the taken/not taken value with a PC bit

fudge.Description: Fudge factor to multiply by perceptron output

recencypos_mask.Description: Which tables should have their indices hashed with the recency position

hshift.Description: How much to shift initial feauture hash before XORing with PC bits

nbest.Description: Use this many of the top performing tables on a low-confidence branch

biasmostly0.Description: Bias perceptron output this much on almost-all-bits-zero local history

biasmostly1.Description: Bias perceptron output this much on almost-all-bits-one local history

instShiftAmt.Description: Number of bits to shift instructions by

imli_mask1.Description: Which tables should have their indices hashed with the first IMLI counter

imli_mask4.Description: Which tables should have their indices hashed with the fourth IMLI counter

BTBTagSize.Description: Size of the BTB tags, in bits

extra_rounds.Description: Number of extra rounds of training a single weight on a low-confidence prediction

indirectBranchPred.Description: Indirect branch predictor, set to NULL to disable indirect predictions

instShiftAmt.Description: Number of bits to shift instructions by

BTBTagSize.Description: Size of the BTB tags, in bits

indirectBranchPred.Description: Indirect branch predictor, set to NULL to disable indirect predictions

instShiftAmt.Description: Number of bits to shift instructions by

tuneonly.Description: If true, only count mispredictions of low-confidence branches

n_sign_bits.Description: Number of sign bits per magnitude

block_size.Description: number of ghist bits in a 'block'; this is the width of an initial hash of ghist

tunebits.Description: Number of bits in misprediction counters

decay.Description: Whether and how often to decay a random weight

local_history_length.Description: Length in bits of each history entry

bias0.Description: Bias perceptron output this much on all-bits-zero local history

bias1.Description: Bias perceptron output this much on all-bits-one local history

pcbit.Description: Bit from the PC to use for hashing global history

hash_taken.Description: Hash the taken/not taken value with a PC bit

fudge.Description: Fudge factor to multiply by perceptron output

recencypos_mask.Description: Which tables should have their indices hashed with the recency position

hshift.Description: How much to shift initial feauture hash before XORing with PC bits

nbest.Description: Use this many of the top performing tables on a low-confidence branch

biasmostly0.Description: Bias perceptron output this much on almost-all-bits-zero local history

biasmostly1.Description: Bias perceptron output this much on almost-all-bits-one local history
